maml:description.maml:para: Adds an access control entry (ACE) to an object.
Adds an access control entry (ACE) to an object such as a file or folder. Other examples would be an object inside of Active Directory.

maml:Description.maml:para: The AccessRights parameter designates the permissions to assign. There are individual permissions as well as 'basic' permissions. See the below table for how the basic permissions permissions map the the advanced permissions.

| Permissions | Basic Full Control | Basic Modify | Basic Read & Execute | Basic List Folder Contents | Basic Read | Basic Write | |:---------------------------: |:------------------: |:------------: |:--------------------: |:--------------------------: |:----------: |:-----------: | | Travers Folder/Execute | X | X | X | X | | | | List Folder/ Read Data | X | X | X | X | X | | | Read Attributes | X | X | X | X | X | | | Read Extended Attributes | X | X | X | X | X | | | Create Files/Write Data | X | X | | | | X | | Create Folders/Append Data | X | X | | | | X | | Write Attributes | X | X | | | | X | | Write Extended Attributes | X | X | | | | X | | Delete Subfolders and Files | X | | | | | | | Delete | X | X | | | | | | Read Permissions | X | X | X | X | X | X | | Change Permissions | X | | | | | | | Take Ownership | X | | | | | | | Synchronize | X | X | X | X | X | X |
The AccessType parameter determines if the ACE allows or denies the permissions assigned.

The AccessRights parameter designates the permissions to assign. There are individual permissions as well as 'basic' permissions. See the below table for how the basic permissions permissions map the the advanced permissions.

| Permissions | Basic Full Control | Basic Modify | Basic Read & Execute | Basic List Folder Contents | Basic Read | Basic Write | |:---------------------------: |:------------------: |:------------: |:--------------------: |:--------------------------: |:----------: |:-----------: | | Travers Folder/Execute | X | X | X | X | | | | List Folder/ Read Data | X | X | X | X | X | | | Read Attributes | X | X | X | X | X | | | Read Extended Attributes | X | X | X | X | X | | | Create Files/Write Data | X | X | | | | X | | Create Folders/Append Data | X | X | | | | X | | Write Attributes | X | X | | | | X | | Write Extended Attributes | X | X | | | | X | | Delete Subfolders and Files | X | | | | | | | Delete | X | X | | | | | | Read Permissions | X | X | X | X | X | X | | Change Permissions | X | | | | | | | Take Ownership | X | | | | | | | Synchronize | X | X | X | X | X | X |
The AccessType parameter determines if the ACE allows or denies the permissions assigned.

The AccessRights parameter designates the permissions to assign. There are individual permissions as well as 'basic' permissions. See the below table for how the basic permissions permissions map the the advanced permissions.

| Permissions | Basic Full Control | Basic Modify | Basic Read & Execute | Basic List Folder Contents | Basic Read | Basic Write | |:---------------------------: |:------------------: |:------------: |:--------------------: |:--------------------------: |:----------: |:-----------: | | Travers Folder/Execute | X | X | X | X | | | | List Folder/ Read Data | X | X | X | X | X | | | Read Attributes | X | X | X | X | X | | | Read Extended Attributes | X | X | X | X | X | | | Create Files/Write Data | X | X | | | | X | | Create Folders/Append Data | X | X | | | | X | | Write Attributes | X | X | | | | X | | Write Extended Attributes | X | X | | | | X | | Delete Subfolders and Files | X | | | | | | | Delete | X | X | | | | | | Read Permissions | X | X | X | X | X | X | | Change Permissions | X | | | | | | | Take Ownership | X | | | | | | | Synchronize | X | X | X | X | X | X |
The AccessType parameter determines if the ACE allows or denies the permissions assigned.

The AccessRights parameter designates the permissions to assign. There are individual permissions as well as 'basic' permissions. See the below table for how the basic permissions permissions map the the advanced permissions.

| Permissions | Basic Full Control | Basic Modify | Basic Read & Execute | Basic List Folder Contents | Basic Read | Basic Write | |:---------------------------: |:------------------: |:------------: |:--------------------: |:--------------------------: |:----------: |:-----------: | | Travers Folder/Execute | X | X | X | X | | | | List Folder/ Read Data | X | X | X | X | X | | | Read Attributes | X | X | X | X | X | | | Read Extended Attributes | X | X | X | X | X | | | Create Files/Write Data | X | X | | | | X | | Create Folders/Append Data | X | X | | | | X | | Write Attributes | X | X | | | | X | | Write Extended Attributes | X | X | | | | X | | Delete Subfolders and Files | X | | | | | | | Delete | X | X | | | | | | Read Permissions | X | X | X | X | X | X | | Change Permissions | X | | | | | | | Take Ownership | X | | | | | | | Synchronize | X | X | X | X | X | X |
The AccessType parameter determines if the ACE allows or denies the permissions assigned.

The AccessRights parameter designates the permissions to assign. There are individual permissions as well as 'basic' permissions. See the below table for how the basic permissions permissions map the the advanced permissions.

| Permissions | Basic Full Control | Basic Modify | Basic Read & Execute | Basic List Folder Contents | Basic Read | Basic Write | |:---------------------------: |:------------------: |:------------: |:--------------------: |:--------------------------: |:----------: |:-----------: | | Travers Folder/Execute | X | X | X | X | | | | List Folder/ Read Data | X | X | X | X | X | | | Read Attributes | X | X | X | X | X | | | Read Extended Attributes | X | X | X | X | X | | | Create Files/Write Data | X | X | | | | X | | Create Folders/Append Data | X | X | | | | X | | Write Attributes | X | X | | | | X | | Write Extended Attributes | X | X | | | | X | | Delete Subfolders and Files | X | | | | | | | Delete | X | X | | | | | | Read Permissions | X | X | X | X | X | X | | Change Permissions | X | | | | | | | Take Ownership | X | | | | | | | Synchronize | X | X | X | X | X | X |
The AccessType parameter determines if the ACE allows or denies the permissions assigned.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Add-NTFSAccess -Path C:\Data -Account 'NT AUTHORITY\Authenticated Users' -AccessRights Read

dev:remarks.maml:para: The above command gives the read permissions to the built-in group of 'Authenticated users'

maml:Description.maml:para: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
